spatial_accuracy.notes: Major wall alignment errors; the central corridor and bathroom placement are significantly warped compared to the technical floor plan. Door orientations are largely ignored or simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls vary wildly in thickness. The balcony/closet area at the top left is replaced with a solid wall and a generic door. Adjacency for the primary bathroom is incorrect.

furniture_mapping.notes: While the general spirit of the living room is captured, the kitchen island is missing, and furniture scale in the bedrooms is disproportionately small.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent 3D rendering quality with soft lighting and clean materials. The isometric camera angle is nearly perfect despite the structural failures.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen counter and sink are misplaced relative to the entryway and L-shape shown in plan.
Missing the specific closet/balcony structure at the top-left of the living area.
The hallway/foyer area is significantly wider and more distorted than the blueprint dimensions allow.
Main entrance door is placed in a corner rather than the mid-section shown in the plan.
Bedroom furniture orientation (beds) does not align with the perimeter walls as indicated in the blueprint.
